abstract: Starbucks reports 17.5 percent jump in revenue to $4.9 billion in quarter ended June 28, compared with $4.2 billion in same period year earlier; profits grew to $626.7 million, from $512.6 million in quarter year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The coffee chain reported profits of $626.7 million, and its revenue grew 17.5 percent, to $4.9 billion.

headline.main: Starbucks Profit Jumps 22%; Chief Cites Increase in Customer Traffic
headline.print_headline: Starbucks Profit Jumps 22%; Chief Cites Increase in Customer Traffic and Transactions

snippet: The coffee chain reported profits of $626.7 million, and its revenue grew 17.5 percent, to $4.9 billion.
